TopicTitle: FPS drop inside VAB when other vehicle is on launchpad

Articles.Content: This might not really be a bug but i notice significant drops in FPS inside the VAB when a large craft is on the launchpad and so there seems to be area for optimisation.
I guess it does not unload the kerbal space center everytime we go in the VAB, to facilitate the switch between the two. Best way to optimise is to not let a craft on the launchpad I guess
